title: Birds that never fly
creator_credit: Harold J. Pollock and Bank of New South Wales
brief_description: This film deals with the flightless birds of Australia and New Zealand: the emu, cassowary, kiwi and the extinct moa. It shows their physical characteristics, breeding and eating habits. Narrated by John Dease. Suitable for upper secondary level.
